pages.text: With $(thing)Shader packs$() you add new light, shadow and water effects to the game. $(br2)Shaders use quite a lot of power, so you should have a strong computer. $(br2)To use shader, you need $(thing)Mods$() like Optifine or Iris. $(br)$(li)They can be placed in the folder $(l)shaderpacks$() within the $(l).minecraft$() folder.
